scripts.lint: eslint Super_preloaderPlus_one_New.user.js dist/*.json .travis/*.js docs/**/*.js dist/*.json docs/**/*.{json,js}
scripts.format:check: prettier --ignore-path=.eslintignore --check Super_preloaderPlus_one_New.user.js dist/*.json .travis/*.js docs/**/*.js dist/*.json docs/**/*.{md,json,js}
scripts.format: prettier --ignore-path=.eslintignore --write Super_preloaderPlus_one_New.user.js dist/*.json .travis/*.js docs/**/*.js dist/*.json docs/**/*.{json,js,md}
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run format:check
